lead_paragraph: A top counterterrorism official gives a rare public assessment of the group’s numbers in the tribal areas of Pakistan.
snippet: A top counterterrorism official gives a rare public assessment of the group’s numbers in the tribal areas of Pakistan.

headline.main: New Estimate of Strength of Al Qaeda Is Offered
headline.print_headline: New Estimate Of Strength Of Al Qaeda Is Offered

byline.original: By DAVID E. SANGER and MARK MAZZETTI
byline.contributor: David E. Sanger reported from Aspen, Colo., and Mark Mazzetti from Washington.
